short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Directly create Jira issues from your browser

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Create Jira issues directly from the page you are currently working on using the sidebar.

Ideal for professionals who work primarily in the browser, such as web agencies, product managers, developers, and QA engineers. Boost your productivity and never lose focus. Minimize context switches.

Features:
● Create Jira issues from the sidebar
● Attach screenshots with one click
● Annotate and crop screenshots
● Save and prefill form fields for faster creation

Works with self-hosted Jira and Jira Cloud (SaaS).

High privacy and security. Nothing is sent to any server. All data stays either on the client or is directly sent to the Jira API.
